page.title: 10Changes in Brinklow
page.content: Miss Denyer's family has lived in the village for over 100 years.She likes living in Brinklow because she likes the countryside and it's not too far to town.She thinks Brinklow is a friendly village but not as friendly as when she was little.Miss Denyer went to Brinklow School and still visits it.She finds shopping is not difficult in Brinklow but goes to near by towns to shop for clothes.She thinks that some of the modern houses spoil Brinklow but doesn't mind the changes because she says "You get used to them",but she wouldn't like the village to get too big.She remembers the time when the trains stopped at Brinklow Station to take school children to Rugby but of course the station is now closed.
